dialogue.String: r.�So ya made it, after all.
1�Sometimes the truth is right under yer nose, and ya just don't know it. We thought this place was destroyed and buried centuries ago.
1�This is Leafallia, the sacred home of the leafkin...and the site where the World Tree was first planted.
1�To think that we're actually here!
1�I know you're itchin' to get started, but we've got to wait for Darrcuiln to bring your princess.
1�How's 'bout takin' a look around while ya wait?
1�<I have seen all, childreeen. Both what you have done, and what has befallen the world.>
1�<And I have choseeen to put my faith in you.>
1�<Pure water is our sustenance, and shiniiing light our shelter. Without those, we would never survive.>
1�<Our Mother cries out for aid. Come, let us begin the preparatiooons.>
1�Glad you could make it.
1�Don't be so harsh on �['im/'er], princess.
1�After all, I'm sure   thought about the consequences should �[he/she] fail.
1�That's why �[he/she] didn't tell ya.
1�Is that true?Yes. It was out of concern.No. I didn't feel like it.
1�I suppose I should thank you...
1�...but I really wish you had told me anyway.
1� , why are you being so mean!?
1�That's not like you. I know it.

1�Ahhhhhhhhh...How strange, having a visitor to our humble abode. Surprising, strange, and difficult to believe.
1�Surprising! Surprising indeed! Our master isn't present right now, so leave!
1�...No. How could it come to pass that one could find this secluded place? It's utterly sealed off, separated, and removed from the world.
1�Yes, yes! Separated! But if �[he/she] is here, that only means our master willed it!
1�Hmmmmmmmmm...If our research, studies, and investigations have taken a backseat for now, then perhaps we can discuss that special thing...
1�Oho, quite special! An adventurer is the perfect guinea pig!
1�Then we have but one simple, easy, and altogether elementary task to do.
1�A straightforward task, yes! Carry out the master's will!
1�And if we're wrong, we just seal off, shelter, and bar the doors to the place forever.
1�Close off! Understood!
1�Listen well, most esteemed guest. Our master has unlocked new possibilities for spirits, souls, and consciousnesses.
1�Open the door, he did! Memories of battles etched upon completely new existences!
1�Yet a spirit is a complex, difficult-to-understand, and nigh-incomprehensible thing made of many interwoven threads.
1�A most difficult nut to crack!
1�But your spirit is marked with memories of battles, fights, and struggles, each a shining star amongst the sky. We wish to view those stars close-up.
1�Yes, a most pleasing brightness! Bring us  $���� and we will open the gates for you!
1�You seem confused, befuddled, and out of sorts. Don't worry--you'll know where to look when you return to your world.
1�And return you will! Both to there, and to here!
1�Splendid! Our master is still out, but we deem you worthy in his place!
1�You should feel honored, blessed, and proud.
1�Honored to receive your just reward!
1�We have prepared, set up, and established three different...dimensions for you to explore.
1�That one opens to a land of  �[toxic miasma/biting winds/unending filth].
1�That one opens to a land of  �[toxic miasma/biting winds/unending filth].
1�That one opens to a land of  �[toxic miasma/biting winds/unending filth].
1�Many lands, all for you with just a quick shake of this 3����!
1�Seek your charge in the ruins, the Serpentine Labyrinth, Outer Ra'Kaznar.
1�Outer Ra'Kaznar! Our master's experiments await!
1�Your Goddess's protection may serve you well...or it may not. Go forth, and flourish in the thrill of battle!
1�Be healthy and hale!
1�You do! You do have 6����!
1�Its energies will be consumed, dissipated, and fully extinguished when you use it to enter our master's ��testing chamber,�� but you can enter again by procuring another.
1�Let me return it, give it back to you, and hand it over.
1�Seek your charge in the ruins, the Serpentine Labyrinth, Outer Ra'Kaznar.
1�Outer Ra'Kaznar! Our master's experiments await!
1�Your Goddess's protection may serve you well...or it may not. Go forth, and flourish in the thrill of battle!
1�Be healthy and hale!
1�A raspy voice reverberates within your mind.
1�Seek your charge in the ruins, the Serpentine Labyrinth, Outer Ra'Kaznar.
1�Outer Ra'Kaznar! Our master's experiments await!
1�Your Goddess's protection may serve you well...or it may not. Go forth, and flourish in the thrill of battle!
1�Be healthy and hale!
1�Should you, for whatever reason, find the experiment...wanting...it would behoove you to visit Ra'Kaznar Turris.
1�For there, you will find another testing chamber...one which may prove more to your liking.
1�Yes...in that chamber, visions of the most formidable of foes await you. And though they may be but passing fantasies, the battles will be no less demanding.
1�And yet, since there is no substance to the terrors you will face, there will be nothing to be gained from your triumphs...if you triumph at all.
1�You seek no material gain, but only the honor and glory of the fight...?
1�Very well...then honor and glory shall be yours.
1�Silence descends once more.
1�Hehehe, and you certainly are enjoying yourself.
1�Much enjoyment to be had! Your soul beams at the very mention of combat!
1�No, no, no! The spirit tells no lies!
1�Some may call it a blood craze, a lust for battle, an inclination for combat, but our master is pleased at your successes, no matter the reason behind them.
1�Honored to receive your just reward!
1�And what did you call yourself again?
1�Ah, yes.  .
1�My name? Skokkr Undrborn.
1�I realize that ��Undrborn�� doesn't roll off the tongue, so you may address me as simply ��Skokkr.��
1�Outstanding. Your will and determination are utterly without parallel.
1�I am here to give you a prototype sigil of sorts in exchange for the three you already hold.
1�Bring me one, and I'll give you another 3����.
1�I trust that your results will be exemplary, and would like to give you a little something...special.
1�And the other thing--the 3����--if you need a new one, then you'll have to gather three more sigils for me.
1�You scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours, hmm? Isn't that how your world operates?
1�Experiments and hypotheses are my bread and butter.
1�Hypothesize and experiment. Then back to the drawing board and draw up more hypotheses to fuel further experiments. How else will we get to the crux of how the world works?
1�How do you respond?Hm?Hello!
1�Hmmm???Ugh. Why do you not understand how to give a simple greeting?
1�How do you respond?Hmmm???Hello!
1�You really are denser than Selbina butter. And with that...goodbye.
1�Oh. Hello there.
1�I always did appreciate someone who knows how to properly greet others.
1�You're one of the good ones--that much I can tell. Now, if you would, please listen to my request.
1�I'm looking for a special powder--a hodgepodge of different minerals and assorted residue that I've taken to calling ��gallimaufry.�� But it's quite difficult to come by on my own.
1�So my request is simple--I'd like you to gather gallimaufry for me.
1�I assume that your answer would be ��yes�� either way...
1�But let me sweeten the pot.
1�Will you help?Fish for more info.Not interested.
1�Ah, yes. My eyes are discerning as ever.
1�First, let me provide you with 6����. Now, here's what I need you to do.
1�I need you to take the 3���� and head to the diaphanous transposer in northwestern Kamihr Drifts (F-6). From there, you can teleport to Outer Ra'Kaznar.
1�That's where you can find all the gallimaufry I need.
1�This Outer Ra'Kaznar is a little different from the one you may be used to, so take care.
1�As soon as you enter Outer Ra'Kaznar, your 3���� will lose its potency and transform into 6����.
1�Fear not. The 3���� will turn back into 6���� if you approach the diaphanous transposer after 20 hours (Earth time) have elapsed.
1�Be aware that only a total of six people can teleport into Outer Ra'Kaznar at any given time.
1�Any more, and you will likely get stuck in the walls or something.
1�That's all you need to know. Good luck!
1�I knew I could count on you. Oh, happy day!
1�I've taken the liberty of preparing a list of items I'll give you in exchange for gallimaufry.
1�You wouldn't happen to have any Empyrean armor, would you?
1�I've pulled some strings with a blacksmith friend of mine, and if you bring me the proper materials I'm sure she'll lend a hand. Take a look at my list for the details.
1�Oh, I know, I know. You're sick of waiting for your 3���� to regenerate. And I'm sick of waiting for more gallimaufry.
1�So I figured ��Hey, if I make another 3����, then we can both be happy!��
1�But nothing is ever so easy, is it? No matter how much blood, sweat, and tears I poured into the process, I couldn't get it to come together properly.
1�But the next day, once my tears were dry, I went back and collected the residual energies from the 3����...
1�And who woulda thunk it--the process was a success after all! The 3���� turned back into 6����! This time, the tears I shed were of joy.
1�So here you are! A brand new 3����!
1�Care to browse my special list?
1�What do you do?View the list.Ask about Outer Ra'Kaznar.Ask about 5����.Ask about 5����.�@�@Leave for now.

1�I see you knew exactly where to come.
1�This is where Oshasha disappeared.Perhaps there is some kind of trap around here?
!?�Ah, I wasn't expecting any additional visitors here...
1�Our master is away.You should leave here at once.
1�Your master? What is this place?
1�This territory was created by our master, Skhoh Undhreh.
1�Skhoh Undhreh!?That was one of the names written in the 3����!
1�We read that only those who are deemed worthy can gain an audience with him, so Oshasha and I were searching throughout Leafallia.
1�So perhaps this means that Oshasha is here as well...
1�That is correct.The path is openly revealed to those who are pure of soul.
1�Those who request an audience with our master must first prove that they are worthy of such an honor.
1�New possibilities await those souls that our master holds in high esteem.
1�New possibilities.
..�And what must we do to prove our worthiness?
1�Wait. You too wish an audience with our master?
1�Do you wish to meet their master?Yes.Maybe later.
1�If we are to find Oshasha, we have no other choice.
1�I do! I request an audience with Skhoh Undhreh!
1�Very well. In that case, there is only one thing you must do.
1�You must work together with this Oshasha to defeat the opponent presented before you.
1�The opponent's soul is stitched together from the recollections of the countless battles etched in Oshasha's soul.
1�That same memory is also within your soul as well.A most powerful and unforgettable memory...
1�An unforgettable memory?
1�Once you are ready, head to the entrance of the trial that we have prepared for you.
1�The gem shall guide you to the trial's location.
1�We are back where we started...
1�Could it be that the reason we were unable to find Oshasha is because she was already here fighting against this memory of hers?
1�If I am right, we cannot afford to wait for Lerene.
1�Just between us, Oshasha faced a traumatic experience in her past that prevents her from being able to use magic.
1�However, she has been able to serve as conservator of the library due to her vast knowledge and experience, and as long as she is still able to use items that are imbued with magic.
1�As such, I do not think she is capable of facing this trial prepared by the demons on her own.
1�We must find Oshasha as quickly as possible and help her!
1�Lerene has nothing but good things to say about you, pioneer.I am counting on your assistance. Let's go!
